title: The Gen. Milley Bombshell | Guests: Sen. Rand Paul & Josh Rogin | 9/15/21
description:
Glenn plays a banned song by John Ondrasik of Five For Fighting called “Blood on My Hands” which critiques the Biden Administration on their Afghanistan evacuation. US General Mark Milley reportedly called his Chinese counterpart and promised to warn them if President Trump started a war. The media are defending General Milley, and Glenn hits back. Sen. Rand Paul joins to discuss the controversy surrounding General Milley and COVID restrictions. Author Jason Chaffetz joins to discuss Hunter Biden and General Milley. Justin Haskins of the Heartland Institute joins to discuss the latest news regarding ESG scores. Author Josh Rogin joins to give his opinion on the General. Milley bombshell. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
